page.title: 18 Beck Row School Events
page.content: Apart from the Village Hall, the School tends to be the central meeting point involving most organisations at various times of the year.The School Annual Fete brings together a large secton of the population who are able to enjoy the various sideshows and stalls organised by the Parent Teacher Organisation. Another highlight is the Christmas Entertainment which is held in the Methodist Chapel, as there is no hall provided at the School.The Chapel is turned into a theatre with stage and lighting and about 300 people attend each of the two evening performances. A Christmas Bazaar follows the second performance, at the School. Sports Day brings many visitors.Other events include End of Term Concerts showing the childrens' skills in acting, music, and gymnastics,and Parents Evenings to discuss educational and school matters.
